com.salesmanager.core.business.services.common.generic

Interface TransactionalAspectAwareService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CategoryService, ContentService, CountryService, CurrencyService, CustomerAttributeService, CustomerOptionService, CustomerOptionSetService, CustomerOptionValueService, CustomerService, DigitalProductService, GroupService, LanguageService, ManufacturerService, MerchantConfigurationService, MerchantLogService, MerchantStoreService, ModuleConfigurationService, OrderProductDownloadService, OrderService, PermissionService, ProductAttributeService, ProductAvailabilityService, ProductImageService, ProductOptionService, ProductOptionValueService, ProductPriceService, ProductRelationshipService, ProductReviewService, ProductService, ProductTypeService, SalesManagerEntityService<K,E>, ShippingOriginService, ShoppingCartService, SystemConfigurationService, TaxClassService, TaxRateService, TransactionService, UserService, ZoneService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryServiceImpl, ContentServiceImpl, CountryServiceImpl, CurrencyServiceImpl, CustomerAttributeServiceImpl, CustomerOptionServiceImpl, CustomerOptionSetServiceImpl, CustomerOptionValueServiceImpl, CustomerServiceImpl, DigitalProductServiceImpl, GroupServiceImpl, LanguageServiceImpl, ManufacturerServiceImpl, MerchantConfigurationServiceImpl, MerchantLogServiceImpl, MerchantStoreServiceImpl, ModuleConfigurationServiceImpl, OrderProductDownloadServiceImpl, OrderServiceImpl, PermissionServiceImpl, ProductAttributeServiceImpl, ProductAvailabilityServiceImpl, ProductImageServiceImpl, ProductOptionServiceImpl, ProductOptionValueServiceImpl, ProductPriceServiceImpl, ProductRelationshipServiceImpl, ProductReviewServiceImpl, ProductServiceImpl, ProductTypeServiceImpl, SalesManagerEntityServiceImpl, ShippingOriginServiceImpl, ShoppingCartServiceImpl, SystemConfigurationServiceImpl, TaxClassServiceImpl, TaxRateServiceImpl, TransactionServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl, UserServiceLDAPImpl, ZoneServiceImpl

    public interface TransactionalAspectAwareService
    Indique que le service doit être rendu transactionnel via un aspect. Cela permet de simplifier la configuration Spring de la partie transactionnelle car il suffit alors de déclarer le pointcut de l'aspect sur this(com.salesmanager.core.business.services.common.generic.ITransactionalAspectAwareService)
